query.sql: SELECT b.CODE_TYPE_CODE AS CODE_TYPE_CODE, CODE_ID AS codeId, b.CODE_TYPE_NAME AS CODE_TYPE_NAME, code AS code, a.CODE_VAL AS codeVal, ( CASE a.IS_AVIABLE WHEN 1 THEN '可用' ELSE '停用' END ) AS isAviable, a.SORT_FLAG AS sortFlag, a.CREATE_USER_ID AS createUserId, a.CREATE_TIME AS createTime FROM SYS_CODE a, SYS_CODE_TYPE b WHERE a.CODE_TYPE_ID = b.CODE_TYPE_ID [@code; AND b.CODE_TYPE_CODE like '%{#code}%' ] [@name; AND b.CODE_TYPE_NAME like '%{#name}%' ] ORDER BY a.SORT_FLAG
